DOC.brief_summary: This is an investigation on the frequency of chronic pain amongst recipients after lung transplantation. Factors relating to the development of chronic pain are investigated.
DOC.brief_title: Chronic Pain After Lung Transplantation, an Incidence Study
DOC.criteria: Able to understand and give consent Can read Residing in Denmark Unable to understand the written information in Danish Abuse (Medicine, Drugs, Alcohol) Severe psychiatric Illness Conflicting neurological disease
